resources.string:
Welcome to the Bamdocar's system, rookie.

 The war between the planets is pressing and, the governments have decided to recruit us.

 Us! The Scorpion are ready to fight, even against our brothers, with enough money obviously.

 Now I will teach you how to command your troops.
Discipline over all, this is how she train the best Guldrum space force
This card represent the skill of the unit. Select a number for read more of what it represent.
1- This is the name of the officer of the unit
2- This numbers represent the cost in resource necessary to play the unit.
3- This is the description of the officer.
4- This number represent the offencive skill of the unit.
5- This number represent the mining (obtain resource) skill of the unit.
6- This number represent the defending skill of the unit.
